data.actual_result: Reaction is removed/added like normal, however the image flickers.
data.expected_result: Reaction is removed/added like normal, image stays visible
data.short_description: Images flicker when reactions are added/removed
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an image, or post one yourself - Ping a group of people (Like the Updates role in Ghoul's testing server) and tell them to react to the image.- Observe.Extension to this bug:- You can also post a comment, then ping the group of people to react to your message with gif emotes and you can see them flickering.
